column4: My linux isnt booting and it says its X Server isnt configured right and it wont boot how so i repair it from a live cd?
you shuld be able to do it from a command line
I am assuming that you have an nVidia graphics card?
It sounds like a driver issue, but I dont know anything about that... all I can say is take a look at xorg.conf.... if you dont know how from command line... it's "sudo nano /etc/X11/xorg.conf"
